description: An API to update the attributes of the billing view.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that can be used to uniquely identify the billing view.

parameters.name: dataFilterExpression
parameters.description: See Expression. Billing view only supports LINKED_ACCOUNT and Tags. dimensions (dict) --- The specific Dimension to use for Expression. The names of the metadata types that you can use to filter and group your results. The metadata values that you can use to filter and group your results. (string) --- tags (dict) --- The specific Tag to use for Expression. The key for the tag. The specific value of the tag. (string) ---

nested_params.name: dimensions
nested_params.description: The specific Dimension to use for Expression.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The names of the metadata types that you can use to filter and group your results.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The metadata values that you can use to filter and group your results.

nested_params.name: tags
nested_params.description: The specific Tag to use for Expression.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The specific value of the tag.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that can be used to uniquely identify the billing view.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the billing view was last updated.
